name: ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialRegistrationRequest
desc: An interface that defines properties for a credential registration request.

items.name: var attestationPreference: ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialAttestationKind
items.desc: The type of attestation you’re requesting.

items.name: var challenge: Data
items.desc: Arbitrary data that the client signs as proof of a valid registration or attestation.

items.name: var displayName: String?
items.desc: A user-visible name for the credential, such as the account’s user name.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: A user-visible name that identifies a credential.

items.name: var relyingPartyIdentifier: String
items.desc: The domain name of the website for the credential.

items.name: var userID: Data
items.desc: Data that the relying party associates with the credential.

items.name: var userVerificationPreference: ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialUserVerificationPreference
items.desc: A preference for whether the authenticator attempts to verify the user at the time of sign-in.
